# BARb balance tweak
 This is a TweakDefs that attempts to improve game quality in coop games vs BARb by making some balance changes.

 To use it, copy the text from the box below and insert it into the Tweak Defs setting:

 ```
 -
 ```

Current change list:

- Remove the ability to jam an area from all units. Jamming units have stealth now to cover for situations where they would've jammed themselves (e.g. minelayer).

- Restrict the amount of air units that can be built. Most attacking units you can build 3-5 of, dragons are set to 0.

- Increase the cost of walls to prevent AI pathfinding confusion.

- Nerf tick speed

- Nerf platypus line of sight range

TODO:
